content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Bush makes to convey his message that he and Quayle were the best choice to be president and vice president.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Bush makes to convey his message that he and Quayle were the best choice to be president and vice president.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
